item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @sorrowlegacy sorrowlegacy
item.description:
@sorrowlegacy wrote:

you go in a folder called character.Then you find the file that have the user name you used for your guy on your server.Now open it.it will look like this:

[ACCOUNT]
character-username = desoft
character-password = kalashas

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 2652
character-posy = 3372
character-rights = 0
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = 78-58-80-142.ip.zebra.lt
character-lastlogin = 20070707
character-energy = 2
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 175

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1163 0
character-equip = 1 1052 0
character-equip = 2 1712 0
character-equip = 3 4151 0
character-equip = 4 1127 0
character-equip = 5 1201 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 1079 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 775 0
character-equip = 10 1837 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 -1 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
character-skill = 0 1 0
character-skill = 1 1 0
character-skill = 2 1 0
character-skill = 3 99 14000000
character-skill = 4 1 0
character-skill = 5 1 0
character-skill = 6 1 0
character-skill = 7 1 0
character-skill = 8 1 0
character-skill = 9 1 0
character-skill = 10 1 0
character-skill = 11 1 0
character-skill = 12 1 0
character-skill = 13 1 0
character-skill = 14 1 0
character-skill = 15 1 0
character-skill = 16 1 0
character-skill = 17 1 0
character-skill = 18 1 0
character-skill = 19 1 0
character-skill = 20 1 0
character-skill = 21 1 0
character-skill = 22 1 0
character-skill = 23 1 0
character-skill = 24 1 0

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

change the numbers at the character skill line. example:

character-skill = 0 1 0

thats the attack.its prensently at level 1/1
to change it,put the second number at 99 and the third at 999999999
it will look like this

character-skill = 0 99 999999999

now your character have level 99/99 attack with 999999999 exp for this level.
heres a skill id guide:

0=attack
1=defence
2=strengh
3=hitpoint
4=range
5=prayer
6=mage
7=cooking
8=woodcutting
9=fletching
10=fishing
11=firemaking
12=crafting
13=smithing
14=mining
15=herblore
16=agility
17=theiving
18=slayer
19=farming
20=runecrafting

hope it helps!!
